resources.string: When you open the app a list with all your songs appears below. If you don\'t have any songs, a message will appear telling you to add songs by tapping the fab + button. When you do so, a new activity opens to add songs. In this new activity you can scan your device for media files, or you can visit various online music stores to buy new songs.

This screen shows the details for the selected song. From here you can play the song by tapping on the Play Now button. You can also see similar songs in a horizontal list. If you tap a similar song a new screen will open with the details for that song.
